import re

def find_xy_lexemes(text):
    pattern = ''
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text, re.I)
    lexemes = []
    for match in matches:
        lexeme = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z]', '', match)
        lexemes.append(lexeme)
    return lexemes

import re

def find_xy_lexemes(text):
    pattern = '[^a-zA-Z]*x[^a-zA-Z]*y[^a-zA-Z]*'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text, re.I)
    lexemes = []
    for match in matches:
        lexeme = re.sub('', '', match)
        lexemes.append(lexeme)
    return lexemes

import re

def find_xy_lexemes(text):
    pattern = '[^a-zA-Z]*x[^a-zA-Z]*y[^a-zA-Z]*'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text, re.I)
    lexemes = []
    for match in matches:
        lexeme = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z]', 'MUTATED', match)
        lexemes.append(lexeme)
    return lexemes
